function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Climate change results in extended geographical range of disease vectors","Impact":"Exponential increase in diseases and illnesses globally, especially in Africa","Mitigation":"Implement climate change mitigation strategies, control disease vector populations, and invest in healthcare infrastructure","Technologies":"Remote sensing for early detection, genetic modification to control vector populations, and telemedicine for healthcare access","People":"Population in Africa, especially those in high-risk areas","Owner":"Government agencies, international organizations, and healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Deforestation leads to cross-contact of pathogens through animal emigration","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and zoonotic outbreaks","Mitigation":"Enforce sustainable forestry practices, protect natural habitats, and regulate agricultural expansion","Technologies":"Satellite imaging for deforestation monitoring, blockchain for supply chain transparency, and AI for predictive modeling of habitat loss","People":"Communities living near deforested areas, agricultural workers, and wildlife conservationists","Owner":"Environmental agencies, forestry companies, and conservation organizations"},{"Description":"Insect range expansion and phenological changes impact disease transmission","Impact":"Higher incidence of insect-borne diseases and altered disease transmission patterns","Mitigation":"Research on insect behavior, habitat modification, and public health campaigns for disease prevention","Technologies":"Big data analytics for insect monitoring, ecological modeling, and genetic modification of insects","People":"Communities at risk of insect-borne diseases, public health agencies, and researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, and government entities"}]}
